sentences.sContent: Development of celluloses that are stable outside the cells of microorganisms enables the culturing of fungi and with yeasts on cellulose hydrolyzates.
sentences.sContent_eng: Development of celluloses that are stable outside the cells of microorganisms enables the culturing of fungi and with yeasts on cellulose hydrolyzates.
sentences.sCn: 开发在微生物细胞外部能稳定存在的纤维素酶使真菌和酵母在纤维素水解产物上培养有了可能。

phrases.pCn: n. [化]醋酸纤维素；纤维素乙酸酯
纤维素钠；羧甲基纤维素钠

words.tran: 细胞性；多孔性；细胞结构

trans.tranCn: 纤维素,（植物的）细胞膜质
trans.tranOther: the material that the cell walls of plants are made of and that is used to make plastics, paper etc
